data.eml:eml: Nebria (Patrobonebria) incognita n. sp. and Nebria (P.) hiekeiana n. sp., two new species from the Western Himalaya, with remarks on Nebria (P.) desgodinsi (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Nebriinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Charles Huber, Hannes Baur (2016): Nebria (Patrobonebria) incognita n. sp. and Nebria (P.) hiekeiana n. sp., two new species from the Western Himalaya, with remarks on Nebria (P.) desgodinsi (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Nebriinae). Entomologische Blätter und Coleoptera 112 (1): 203-214, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.247616
